function.name: dishWashing_getRemainingTime
function.description: This function is used to inform the user of the remaining time for a dishwashing cycle.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to check the remaining time.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment for checking the remaining time.
